definition: once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)

sentences.english: The garden of my ancestor, Ts'ui Pen.
sentences.chinese: 那是我曾祖彭取的花园。

sentences.english: My great-grandpa left this necklace to me.
sentences.chinese: 项链是我的曾祖父留下来的。

sentences.english: great-great-grandfather was a cop in New York City.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾曾祖父曾是纽约警察。

sentences.english: Gary's great-grandma grew aghast at Gary's poor grammar.
sentences.chinese: 加里的曾祖母对加里那糟糕的语法感到很惊讶。

sentences.english: The president visited a village where his great-great-great-grandfather once lived.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统还访问了他的外高曾祖父曾经居住的村子。

sentences.english: She was someone from my great-grandmother's side of the family, and lived in the country in a small county in northern Jiangsu.
sentences.chinese: 是曾祖母娘家人，在江苏北部一个小县份的乡下住着。

sentences.english: The girl throws back to her great-great-grandmother, who had that unusually red hair.
sentences.chinese: 这女孩长得像她那位生着一头特别红头发的远曾祖母。

sentences.english: The houseboat on the banks of the Mississippi in which my great-grandmother lived.
sentences.chinese: 我曾祖母住在密西西比河附近，在河堤旁有一艘游艇。

sentences.english: Both of my great-grandfathers were killed.
sentences.chinese: 我的两位曾祖父都遭到杀害。

sentences.english: Annie: My great-grandfather gave it to my great-grandmother when they got married.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖父把它送给了我的曾祖母，在他们结婚时。

sentences.english: Annie: My great-grandfather gave it to my great-grandmother when they got married.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖父把它送给了我的曾祖母，在他们结婚时。

sentences.english: I have a lucky charm bracelet, which is my great-grandfather's watch chain.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个幸运手链，那是我曾祖父的表链。

sentences.english: My great-grandparents were Jewish immigrants from Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖父曾祖母是来自东欧的犹太移民。

sentences.english: My great-grandparents were Jewish immigrants from Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖父曾祖母是来自东欧的犹太移民。

sentences.english: My great grandfather would have laughed at my fumbling attempts at hitching and riding a horse.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖会因我愚笨地尝试拴马和骑马而大笑。

sentences.english: She was, by one rough estimate, your 10,000th—great—grand –mother.
sentences.chinese: 粗略估算一下，她是你的第前10，000代曾祖母。

definition: father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
